name: Jungle Keeper
description:
GamePlay Scenary

Inside the tropical forest, a sacred object with the ability to amplify the powers of people who recently possessed it is hidden. A shaman from a forgotten tribe, full of evil, seeks to seize all the wealth that is protected by nature and his ancestors.

The guardian's mission is to retrieve this powerful gem to defeat the shaman and end evil without harming animals. To do this, you will have several collectibles, including a macuahuitl that will allow you to cancel the possession of animals at all levels, in order to decrease the power of the shaman in each of the levels you will be able to find the pieces of the sacred totem that will increase your magical powers. Help them reach the final battle.
